member.name: M:MoneyTracking.Identity.Controllers.AuthController.Register(MoneyTracking.Identity.Models.RegisterRequest)
member.returns: If registration was successful returns a user id and a JWT Token. Else returns a error with a message.

member.name: M:MoneyTracking.Identity.Controllers.AuthController.Login(MoneyTracking.Identity.Models.LoginRequest)
member.returns: If registration was successful returns a user id and a JWT Token. Else returns a error with a message.
